title: Drive
brief_description: ‘Drive’ takes the watcher on a drive through the bright lights and dark corners of a big city. The animation uses a combination of 3D animation and line drawing to surreal effect giving the work a dreamlike quality - not unlike the experience of driving through the city at night.
